Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
